item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: We’ve got a saucy, sexy one for you this week! By the talented Rithion! I think it’s really fun to see what Rithion did here, trying to showing something as abstract as a ghostly scent in a visual comic form. =D Rithion worked on this, gosh, I don’t know 4? 5? months ago, right in […]
item.content:encoded:
Ghost Scent by Rithion

by Matthew Nolan on 03/08/2022 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Fun Smutty Comics »
  • Guest Comics

We’ve got a saucy, sexy one for you this week! By the talented Rithion! I think it’s really fun to see what Rithion did here, trying to showing something as abstract as a ghostly scent in a visual comic form. =D

Rithion worked on this, gosh, I don’t know 4? 5? months ago, right in the middle of all that scrambling we had to do while we rethought OJST and built the team! So I’m really happy to finally share the end comic with you all. Hope you all like it!

  • NSFW Twitter
  • SFW Twitter
  • Patreon

item.title: Growing Up Without Sex-Ed by Jey Pawlik
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: Hey everyone, thanks so much for reading this very personal story of mine. It’s something I’ve dealt with for a long time, realizing that what my late mother did was wrong and really affected how I grew up. I’ve come out of it all as a better person and now I draw porn for work! […]
item.content:encoded:
Growing Up Without Sex-Ed by Jey Pawlik

by Matthew Nolan on 03/01/2022 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Favorites »
  • Guest Comics »

Hey everyone, thanks so much for reading this very personal story of mine. It’s something I’ve dealt with for a long time, realizing that what my late mother did was wrong and really affected how I grew up. I’ve come out of it all as a better person and now I draw porn for work!

  • Portfolio
  • Webcomics
  • Patreon
  • Twitter

Matthew here with a bonus link:
– Jey has their own Catagory now! So click on over for more amazing Jey comics!

item.title: Refuge by Hien Pham
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: It’s ok to hurt. It’s ok to need time. Try to be kind to yourself. Hien Pham is our artist today, showing us all today how powerful and important comics are. I can’t thank him enough for sharing such a moving personal story with us and I truly feel honored to have it on the […]
item.content:encoded:
Refuge by Hien Pham

by Matthew Nolan on 02/22/2022 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Favorites »
  • Guest Comics »
  • Health »
  • Hien Pham »
  • Non-Fiction Comics

It’s ok to hurt. It’s ok to need time.
Try to be kind to yourself.

Hien Pham is our artist today, showing us all today how powerful and important comics are. I can’t thank him enough for sharing such a moving personal story with us and I truly feel honored to have it on the site. If you want to see the rest of his OJST comics, check them out here. Then go drop him a follow or two on his socials. I promise you won’t regret it.

  • Portfolio
  • Interactive stuff
  • Twitter
  • Sexy Comics

item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: Christine Suggs tells us the story of who they are and what their body has meant to them over the years! A lovely beat-by-beat play of growth and exploration and most importantly (I think) kindness for oneself. That final panel just hits so hard! I hope you all love it as much as we do […]
item.content:encoded:

by Matthew Nolan on 02/15/2022 at 12:02 am

Christine Suggs tells us the story of who they are and what their body has meant to them over the years! A lovely beat-by-beat play of growth and exploration and most importantly (I think) kindness for oneself. That final panel just hits so hard!

I hope you all love it as much as we do and go tell Christine how fantastic they are!

  • Twitter
  • Instagram
  • Portfolio

Hoping you all had a lovely Valentine’s! Erika and I sat in and ate reheated Ikea meatballs… the perfect night ;D

item.title: A Day in the Life of an Erotic Artist by Jey Pawlik
item.dc:creator: Jey Pawlik
item.description: Happy hourly comics day everyone! This is my 7th year participating (my past hourly comics can be read here) and so happy to have been able to log a full day of working on porn for you all! I really enjoy the job I have, I find it’s very rewarding, and even if some panels […]
item.content:encoded:
A Day in the Life of an Erotic Artist by Jey Pawlik

by Jey Pawlik on 02/01/2022 at 12:02 am
  • Adventures »
  • Comic »
  • Favorites »
  • Guest Comics »
  • Interviews »
  • Jey Pawlik »
  • Non-Fiction Comics

Happy hourly comics day everyone!

This is my 7th year participating (my past hourly comics can be read here) and so happy to have been able to log a full day of working on porn for you all! I really enjoy the job I have, I find it’s very rewarding, and even if some panels can be tough to get right I know I’ve become a better artist after finishing them!

The page I was working on throughout this comic is part of a finished story that I have up on my Patreon.

  • Portfolio
  • Webcomics
  • Twitter
  • Patreon

Matthew here with some extra bonus links:

– If you liked Jey’s comic today, consider peeking at the rest of their comics here. They’ve made us a whole bunch of amazing comics over the years!
– Also, Jey’s currently open for commissions – which you should 100% sign up for if you’re keen for some art.
– Finally, Erika and I drew an hourly comic back in 2017 if you want to check it out too!

└ Tags (chosen by OJST and artist/s): autobio, guest, guest comic, Hourly comics, hourly comics day, Jey Pawlik, jeypawlik

item.title: Quite A Dish by Curleebunny
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: We’re on the ramp-up to Valentine’s Day! So Curleebunny is here with an adorable and silly sexy comic, to warm you all up with. We hope you like it! It was just a pleasure to see in development, and I’m so happy you all get to see it now! Follow Curleebunny and give them a […]
item.content:encoded:
Quite A Dish by Curleebunny

by Matthew Nolan on 01/25/2022 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Fun Smutty Comics »
  • Guest Comics

We’re on the ramp-up to Valentine’s Day! So Curleebunny is here with an adorable and silly sexy comic, to warm you all up with. We hope you like it! It was just a pleasure to see in development, and I’m so happy you all get to see it now!

Follow Curleebunny and give them a big ol hello:

  • Twitter
  • Portfolio
  • Linktree
  • Patreon
  • Manga Draft
  • Inprint Shop

Just a reminder to any of you out there; We’re on the hunt for more and new guest comics. Especially comics about sex education and personal stories! Absolutely fine too if it’s a comic or subject we’ve had in the past; as we continue to develop into something more community-driven, newer and fresher voices are much needed on well-worn topics, especially on the subject of sex!

So if you’ve been wanting a chance to show up on OJST. We’d love to hear from you! Drop me an email!

ALSO – as we approach Valentine’s we get asked a lot about THE best toys to get. But thing is, Erika and I have been out/taking a break from the toy review game for nearly 6 months, so don’t have the freshest opinions. That being said. If you want to know what still lives by our bedside, the real honest to god tried-and-trues, check out our Best of from last year. It’s a real beast of a list and absolutely where I’d start when shopping.

└ Tags (chosen by OJST and artist/s): a gender, agender, bunnies, bunny, chores, curlee bunny, curleebunny, dishes, distraction, ears, guest, guest comic, maid, non-binary, nonbinary, pan, pansexual, procrastination, rabbit

item.title: The Cherry Bomb by Paige Hender
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: Paige Hender shares with us a lovely thoughtful autobio comic about ‘virginities’, sexual experiences, and living in a world where there’s so much pressure to live and go fast. It’s a lovely reminder that we don’t have to rush things and that you can set whatever pace you like when it comes to the world […]
item.content:encoded:
The Cherry Bomb by Paige Hender

by Matthew Nolan on 01/18/2022 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Guest Comics »
  • Non-Fiction Comics »
  • Sex & Sexuality

Paige Hender shares with us a lovely thoughtful autobio comic about ‘virginities’, sexual experiences, and living in a world where there’s so much pressure to live and go fast. It’s a lovely reminder that we don’t have to rush things and that you can set whatever pace you like when it comes to the world of sex. Thank you Paige, it’s thoughtful and beautiful and Oh Joy Sex Toy is lucky to have it!

Go visit Paige, let her know she’s awesomesauce.

  • Twitter
  • Instagram
  • Portfolio

item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: Oh heck, I lovvvvvve this comic so dang much! From the colors to the sexy action; it’s the bright and happy start to the year we all need. Thank you Lena Let for a wonderfully amazing and sexy piece! LenaLets Twitter Not much news for you all this week. Erika’s still busy working away at […]
item.content:encoded:
Perfect Weather by Lena Let

by Matthew Nolan on 01/11/2022 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Fun Smutty Comics »
  • Guest Comics

Oh heck, I lovvvvvve this comic so dang much! From the colors to the sexy action; it’s the bright and happy start to the year we all need.

Thank you Lena Let for a wonderfully amazing and sexy piece!

  • LenaLets Twitter

Not much news for you all this week. Erika’s still busy working away at a new Patreon/splitting our current Patreon for her autobio comics. So stay tuned on that front. In the meantime, I know Omicron is making the rounds, so stay warm and safe out there folks.

In the ramp-up to Valentines, we know some of you might be fishing for a latest BEST OF comic or list. With Erika still stepping away from OJST and our toy-testing-days about 6 months out of date, we don’t have a NEW list for you all. Instead, we’ll be recommending LAST YEAR’S list as, heck, these are still all the toys and recommendations that we hold near and dear. These are STILL all the toys we recommend without a blink. So if you’re in the mood to shop, start there!

└ Tags (chosen by OJST and artist/s): fantasy, fiction, Friends, group sex, groupsex, guest, guest comic, Hike, hiking, Lena Let, LenaLet, orgy, outdoor, outdoors, wet

item.title: Frog Princesses by Binky and DaZa
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: It’s almost traditional now that as the new year rolls around we end up posting a bundle of saucy comics! Starting the new year out with a bang ;D Binky and Daza had been working on this wonderful take on the Princess Frog tale for a while and brought it over to me to see […]
item.content:encoded:
Frog Princesses by Binky and DaZa

by Matthew Nolan on 01/04/2022 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Fun Smutty Comics »
  • Guest Comics

It’s almost traditional now that as the new year rolls around we end up posting a bundle of saucy comics! Starting the new year out with a bang ;D

Binky and Daza had been working on this wonderful take on the Princess Frog tale for a while and brought it over to me to see if we’d be interested in posting it. Heck, this is so wonderful and sexy and sweet- I leapt (hopped?) at the chance to have it here on the site and in your browsers.

  • Binky Instagram
  • Binky Patreon
  • Daza Twitter
  • Daza IG
  • Daza Patreon

Daza’s been here before if you want to peek at their previous comic!

Hope you enjoy today’s comic! A huge thank you to all the Patrons and our Sponsor for keeping this site alive and well this past year! We truly don’t take any of you for granted and appreciate every buck of support you send us.

A Happy new year’s friends. Let’s make this one a good one =)

└ Tags (chosen by OJST and artist/s): Binky, DaZa, fantasy, fiction, Frog, guest, guest comic, Kiss, Prince, Princess and the Frog

item.title: Landmarks by Hien Pham
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: Another year rolls by and, if you’re like me, you can look down and see all the new landmarks accrued. 2021’s over, we made it, we survived another one. Hien Pham’s here today being brutally honest and open and amazing. I think it’s an important one, well worth the read, it makes me ever thankful […]
item.content:encoded:
Landmarks by Hien Pham

by Matthew Nolan on 12/28/2021 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Education Comics »
  • Favorites »
  • Guest Comics »
  • Guest Education »
  • Health »
  • Hien Pham »
  • Interviews »
  • Non-Fiction Comics

Another year rolls by and, if you’re like me, you can look down and see all the new landmarks accrued. 2021’s over, we made it, we survived another one.

Hien Pham’s here today being brutally honest and open and amazing. I think it’s an important one, well worth the read, it makes me ever thankful Hien is here making us comics. Do make sure to tell him he’s amazing. You can read more of his OJST comics here!

  • Portfolio
  • Interactive stuff
  • Twitter
  • Instagram
  • Sexy Comics

2021 was a biggie for us here; Erika’s been stepping away from OJST and we’ve been working to fill those big shoes. As we step forward into 2022, we’re hoping to continue on the changes and adaption for the site, to keep building it slowly but surely into a community and team-driven platform. Here to leave people better off than they arrived, no matter the person. I hope you’ll continue to join us as we go.

We don’t really DO big pledge drives (maybe we should?), but if you like what we do here please know that we run a Patreon where you can chip in a buck per comic for work we post here. It keeps us going and helps us pay a professional rate to our artists. Truly, a few months of support means the world.

└ Tags (chosen by OJST and artist/s): autobio, beard, body, body image, body positivity, bodyimage, bodypositivity, curve, curves, grey hair, guest, guest comic, Hien Pham, HienPham, insecurities, landmarks, stretch mark

item.content:encoded:
Flashrunner by Xero Skyfire

by Matthew Nolan on 12/21/2021 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Fun Smutty Comics »
  • Guest Comics

A happy happy New Matrix Day to you all!

Xero Skyfire is here today, delivering us some saucy cyberpunk freerunning sexytimes! It’s lewd, rude, and just too much fun. When Xero handed in these files I HAD to bump her work up to match with the Matrix release. As a 90s kid running a sexy webcomic, it felt too perfect of an homage to one of the most important films of my young life.

Go visit Xero and let her know she drew up a heck of a comic!

  • Twitter
  • Patreon

Hoping you all managed to get some RnR in this winter period!
